author: Seun Durojaiye
title: Florence Ita Giwa celebrates birthday in style ▷ NAIJ.COM
text: Former Senator Florence Ita Giwa celebrates 71 years of age in style Florence Ita Giwa Florence Ita Giwa is a politician who served as senator for the Cross River South constituency of Cross River State from 1999-2003. The 71-year-old woman is well achieved and lives her old age happy and remains as friendly as she's always been. READ ALSO: Why I married Dele Giwa - Ita-Giwa To celebrate her new age, mama Florence had dinner with close family and friends and got a surprise from her celebrity friends. Including, Banky W who posted the video on his snapchat as they sang for the sweet looking mama at 71. Florence Ita Giwa surprise birthday cake Happy birthday ma. Many more blissful years to come!
